attributes.action: Help us, the British Student towards university tuition feels more, and freezing the cost
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: On March 17th 2009, the Government has responded saying that tuition fees could rise to £7000 per year, therfore decreasing the number of students. As a British student, I would like to see the student fees lower than £3000 per year, as anything higher gives the government more money from student loans containing interest. By preventing students going to university, only the working class will suffer, and mostly those who don't qualify for government grants such as myself. I believe I have a right to education, just the same as everyone else, and our currupt government should not be stopping this.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
